modName: Assassins Creed - Jester Clothes female replacer
summary: Replaces female Jester Clothes with a cool Assassin\'s Creed robe.
descriptionHtml:
**About the mod:

An Assassin\'s Creed mod for females. Jester/Cicero\'s gloves, boots, hat and clothes were replaced.

**New in 1.2:

-Fixed incorrect texture for farmclothes03 item.

**New in 1.1:

-Jester hat is now replaced with the hood correctly.
-Gloves changed.
-General textures improvements.
-Very subtle black hand symbol added to fit TES lore.
-Irrelevant textures (non-usable) removed from the uploaded file.

**Installation:

Select only one version (black or white) and drop the \"AC - Female replace.esp\" file, \"meshes\" and \"textures\" folders in your \"Data\" directory. Remember to activate the .esp file from \"Data Files\" in Skyrim Launcher. 

**Compatibility:

Anything that changes Jester armor or farmclothes03 textures/meshes will be incompatible with this.

**Permission:

If you use my mod just give some credit.

**Thanks to:

Bethesda for such a great game
The Nexus because it rocks
To i3vdone for his great TESNIP guide (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1744)
author: luix_luix
